body_html:
That solution would definitely be smart, especially in the short term. I've found a lot of code that squares via the inefficient power function.

However, I think it would be smart to implement a square function nonetheless to make the difference in behavior more clear.

body:
That solution would definitely be smart, especially in the short term.  I've found a lot of code that squares via the inefficient power function.

However, I think it would be smart to implement a square function nonetheless to make the difference in behavior more clear.
